SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.Model

Class Bookshelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Model.Bookshelf
public class Bookshelf extends Object
Class used to manage matrix which contains the tiles selected by the player.
  • to update;
  • to calculate the vicinity points;
  • to check conditions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Bookshelf()
    Initialize the bookshelf with the Matrix and set every position to EMPTY.

    • checkColumns

      public boolean checkColumns(int choice, int column)
      Method to check if the column given is full of tiles.

      REQUIRES: choice between 1 and 6 AND column between 0 and 4.

      Parameters:
      choice - number of tiles chosen.
      column - index of the colum chosen.
      Returns:
      true if the column is full, false if it isn't.

    • checkEndGame

      public boolean checkEndGame()
      Method to check if the matrix is full.
      Returns:
      true if the matrix is full, false if it isn't.

    • checkEmptyBoard

      public boolean checkEmptyBoard()
      Method to check if the matrix is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the matrix is empty, false if it isn't.

    • checkPossibleChoice

      public boolean checkPossibleChoice(int j)
      Method to check if it is possible to add the number of chosen tiles in the matrix.
      Parameters:
      j - number of tile selected.
      Returns:
      true if the matrix is possible, false if it isn't.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Method to check if the matrix is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the matrix is empty, false if it isn't.

      column - index of the column for tiles.
